title: Safe & Sound: The Triumph of Faith
description: When Amy Millhouse and her sorority sisters traveled to Mexico for vacation, they never expected what would be waiting for them: sun, sand, and a drug cartel holding the girls ransom for everything they were worth â€“ and more. Set against the backdrop of the ongoing drug wars in Mexico, this book is the story of one woman's journey to Hell and back, and how her faith in God brings her home. *This book contains themes that may be inappropriate for minors. Reader discretion is advised.
author: Ally Murphy
